meanings.definition: Based on personal opinions or feelings rather than facts.
meanings.sent1: Her subjectiveness opinion colored her view of the movie.
meanings.sent2: The artist's subjectiveness interpretation of the painting was unique.
meanings.sent3: His subjectiveness choice of ice cream flavors always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The subjectiveness nature of art allows for endless creativity.
meanings.sent5: The subjectiveness approach to problem-solving led to innovative solutions.

meanings.definition: The quality of being influenced by personal opinions or feelings.
meanings.sent1: The subjectiveness of the review made it hard to trust.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the subjectiveness of the poetry, as it felt more personal.
meanings.sent3: The subjectiveness of the weather forecast made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, subjectiveness can greatly impact decisions.
meanings.sent5: The subjectiveness of the author's writing style made the book captivating.
